Description:
Versatile family living.
This extremely neat and well maintained home sits on a lavish and secure 780m2 approx. allotment offering ample room for the whole family to enjoy, nestled away in a quiet court location with close proximity to all major amenities. This exceptional property reflects the care and attention by the current owners and provides a large lounge boasting polished floorboards and gas heating with access to the practical kitchen adjacent the laundry. Three comfortable sized bedrooms in total (2 with BIR's) are located nearby the central bathroom while outside a convenient workshop space provides an additional W/C perfect for an added rumpus room or storage if needed. Secure parking is ensured in the large garaging to the side of the property which has had a portion of the space converted into an enclosed studio or potential 4th bedroom. Ample space still remains in the large driveway for storing boats, caravans or trailers if required. This incredible brick veneer home offers so much versatility for investors and owner occupiers alike. Location is ideal just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages & sporting facilities nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!
Insights: 4 Clive Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Location, Charm & Opportunity
Walk through glass double doors into the grand sunlit lounge room, to sit around the open fire place. Adjoined is a separate dining room with access to the spacious kitchen. Central bathroom services the house with shower, bath & toilet. A second living space can double as a fourth bedroom downstairs for the growing family. Second floor provides two fantastic sized bedrooms with BIR, attic storage & master with A/C.
In a location central to all amenities in Corio this home will be on top of your list! It is in close proximity to local schools, bus routes, medical facilities, sporting grounds, and a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre. Easy access to the Ring Road, bringing Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD under 15 minutes! Perfect for a first home buyer, family, or investor, it will feel like home as soon as you step inside.
Dont miss out on this one & inspect today!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Luxury living.
Bursting with charm, sophistication and elegance this 3 bedroom home sitting on a 674m2 approx. allotment offers an easy and convenient lifestyle for the new purchasers. Fully renovated inside and out this immaculate property possesses open planned living zones, excellent outdoor entertaining and much more, ideal for the growing family, first home buyers or investors. Upon entrance the spacious lounge at the front of the home boasts gas heater and floorboards which flow through to the dining room and stylish kitchen containing stainless steel appliances. All 3 generous bedrooms including BIR's are located towards the rear of the home along with the gleaming central bathroom and laundry. Outside offers an abundance of room for the whole family to enjoy with built in playground for the kids, a large undercover alfresco area and a secure garage which has been converted into a workshop with an extensive rumpus room behind featuring high ceilings and open wood fire perfect for year round use. This elegant family home has been finished to perfection with close attention detail in all aspects. Located within close proximity to schools for all ages, public transport, multiple parks and Shell Reserve, the Corio Shopping Centre
is just a minutes drive away. Inspections are a must to appreciate all this incredible home has to offer!
Insights: 7 Teresa Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Elite family home in Cloverdale Estate.
This spacious family abode is set upon an impressive 705sqm (approx.) and offers sensational family living. Prominently positioned in the heart of Corio, conveniently close to quality schools, Goldsworthy Reserve, transport to the Geelong CBD & the Geelong Ring Road. An enviable lifestyle awaits for the newest owner of this meticulous family residence. The home comprises 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes, and large central bathroom complete with bath and separate shower. The spacious open plan kitchen / meals / living area has access to a large outdoor style alfresco dining area fantastic for entertaining.The kitchen itself has been recently remodelled/repainted and includes dishwasher as well as new gas stove hot plates with spectacular views of the rear yard. Outside provides an amazing amount of room for the whole family to enjoy including a cubby house with mature fruit trees close by, 2 separate sheds (one with electricity connected) and of course featuring the large swimming pool at the centre. Further features include ducted heating, recently restored roof, new electric meter box, new timber side gates and much more! This prized location has easy access to Corio Shopping Centre and further major amenities
within easy reach. If you are looking for something special this is the one for you.
Insights: 31 Princess Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A Quality Development - Move In, Unpack & Enjoy!
Due for completion in the coming weeks, quality two and three bedroom townhouses within minutes to Corio Village Shopping Centre, Corio Train Station and primary schools. Each home consists of generous bedrooms - master with split system & ensuite (unit 1), central bathroom with separate bath, shower, vanity and wall to ceiling tiles.
Open plan kitchen/dining and living with split system heating & cooling, laundry, separate toilet, single/double lock up garage with roller door and direct access into home. Other features include range hood, electric cook top, gas oven, dishwasher, internal/external LED lights and ducted heating throughout.
First in best dressed, only two available...be quick!!
Unit 1 (Front) - $320,000 & Unit 2 (Rear) $295,000

Description:
Run, Don't Walk!
Situated in Geelong's residential growth zone, this 3 bedroom home presents a great development opportunity (STCA). The 607 sqm allotment is ideally located within walking distance of Corio Village, schools, doctors and public transport. The original interior features functional kitchen with upright gas stove and oven, while a lounge-room with polished hardwood timber floors and gas heating adds further appeal and the central bathroom provides the convenience of a shower-over-bath. Secure your chance to capitalise on all this home has to offer and future potential!

Description:
Immaculate Family entertainer.
Perfectly positioned this immaculately presented home is ideal for the growing family and for those who love to entertain. Boasting large spacious living zones and impressive out door entertaining areas it creates the perfect relaxed living environment. Residing on the ground floor, the three bedrooms offer BIR's & are serviced by an updated central bathroom providing large corner spa bath and shower. Accompanying the bedrooms, the lower level also offers a generous living area, gleaming kitchen with dishwasher & gas cooking as well as a dining area which opens to the extensive undercover alfresco area providing seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining. On the second level, you'll find a large and spacious family room complete with balcony overlooking the backyard. With access from the rear deck lies a separate studio which could easily be converted into a 4th bedroom or additional office space if required. This home has been designed with practicality and entertaining in mind and boasts a second paved undercover area complete with built in BBQ and views of the impressive in ground pool. A single car garage offers secure parking while the large driveway provides added room for additional parking space. Additional features of the property include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar panels and much more all situated on a 613m2 (approx.) allotment. This charming family home located in the Cloverdale Estate is easily accessible to all major amenities such as Corio Shopping Centre, quality schools for all ages, numerous reserves as well as public transport available close by.
Insights: 6 Kerry Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Impressive Family Home
Built with family and entertainment in mind this impressive home is sure to appeal to families that need lots of space. Located within easy access to schools, shops and the ring road and offering formal living at the front of the home, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, family dining and huge 2nd living area. From here you exit the home through sliding glass doors to the covered outdoor entertainment area. The sleeping quarters consist of a master bedroom complete with walk in robe and ensuite and 3 other good size bedrooms with BIRs that are serviced by a central bathroom. Double garage with remote control door and with drive through access makes storing the boat, trailer and caravan easy. Other features of this home include security system and a 5000lt water tank just to name a few. If you love family time and entertaining an inspection of this property is a must.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Three Bedroom Home with Ample Sheding.
This well-maintained brick home on a 597m2 (approx) corner block is sure to impress. Starting with a great sized lounge room with air conditioner, three bedrooms, two with built in robes, and a renovated main bathroom with separate shower and bath. Large open plan well equipped kitchen with dishwasher and a 900m cooker. Light filled dining area off the kitchen leads out to the undercover entertainment area. Outside you will find well maintained gardens and hard to come by double carport with auto roller door plus double garage with concrete and power! Extras include ducted heating throughout, split system and ceiling fans. This property is well worth a look and is suited to those wanting to downsize or to start your home ownership journey.

Description:
Stunningly Updated Ripe For Modern Family Living
Look out, we have the perfect family home for you! Conveniently positioned in a family-wise pocket is this impeccably maintained, updated home; sure to impress the savvy investor or first home buyer.
Comfort and space form a wonderful combination throughout this well-maintained home, delivering three sizeable bedrooms all with built in robes, serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
Offering a generous size open plan living area that adjoins the functional kitchen and dining space, which leads out onto the undercover timber deck entertaining area; ready to host guests all year round.
Outdoor features a large double garage and double carport with a fully fenced rear yard; secure for pets and kids to enjoy. In the low maintenance garden area you will find a perfect oasis under the timber gazebo, to enjoy a coffee and a good book or just soak up the sunshine!
Additional features including polished timber floorboards, gas oven, air conditioning and gas ducted heating make this home ready to be loved and enjoyed.
Perfectly located, only a short walk to Corio Central Shopping Centre and public transport, with easy access to the ring road and local schools, this family home is one you don’t want to miss out on.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Immaculate Home in Prime Location!
This solid brick family home is securely set on concrete stumps and has been fastidiously maintained throughout its years. Set on an ideal 570sqm (approx) allotment, the home is situated just moments to a plethora of fabulous amenities such as Corio Village shopping centre, swim and leisure Centre, Medical Clinics, Primary and secondary schools including Geelong Grammar and Public Transport, plus offers easy access to both the Melbourne and Ring Roads.
This neat-as-a-pin home comprises three light and bright bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes and are serviced by the main bathroom - featuring new vanity, stand up shower and bath. Adjoining is a separate toilet and large laundry room with plenty of storage. The comfortable living area opens to the super spacious dining and ideal kitchen zone, where an oversized functional kitchen offers an abundance of cabinetry with a four burner gas stove top and double sinks.
Outside you'll be impressed with the secure fencing, single carport, single lock-up garage, garden shed and two ample sized front and rear yards. Additional extras include: heating and cooling and quality window furnishings throughout the home. New guttering and instantaneous gas hot water service. This is an ideal investment opportunity or fabulous first home - for any buyer! Expected rental potential is $280-$300 per week. Offers are welcome - vendor says "must sell!"
Insights: 4 Somerset Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
This is the one.
In an ever convenient location, this home provides easy access to the ring road, just a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre & across the road from parkland and sporting facilities. Also enjoy the close proximity to schools, bus routes & health care just moments away. Perfectly suited to first home buyers looking for a neat home they can make their own, or investors wanting to extend their portfolios. The attractive facade features white trim, bay window & neat front yard while inside offers a spacious main living room at the heart of the home which opens up to the practical kitchen adjoining the meals area. All three bedrooms can be found off the main hall close to the central bathroom and separate W/C. Outside you're greeted by an extensive undercover alfresco area, large rear yard as well as single lock up garage for secure parking all located on a grand 613m2 (approx.) allotment. Immaculately presented and well cared for this charming home offers an amazing amount of potential for its new owners.

Description:
A Real Winner!
From its immaculately landscaped gardens to its well-designed floorplan, this one-owner family home is picture-perfect! Three bedrooms, including master with ceiling fan, are serviced by a central bathroom, while exposed timber beams are a highlight of the large lounge room. The beautifully renovated oak kitchen features ample cupboard space, electric glass cooktop, built-in wall oven and wrap-around bench which overlooks a separate meals area. Outside, the large backyard with single garage and covered carport provides additional storage solutions for boats, caravans or trailers. Situated on 563 sqm in a prominent growth zone, development potential abounds (STCA). Within close proximity of schools, shopping centres, transport and Ring Road access, be quick to register your interest!

Description:
Renovate or Sub-divide You Decide!
With a block of approx 710m that has the home positioned close to the front in well maintained gardens behind tall secure fencing; this is the property you have been searching for. The original three bedroom floor plan has been converted to two bedrooms allowing a dedicated dining area adjacent the kitchen. This alteration is complimented by the bungalow equally suited as a third bedroom for those teenagers craving a taste of independence, guest accommodation or a teenage/parent retreat. The hobbyist / handyman is offered the luxury of a large workshop independent of the garage and carport enabling tools, equipment and projects to remain safe and undisturbed by the unavoidable daily traffic experienced in garage workshops. Ideally situated off main roads yet convenient to sporting facilities, schools and Corio village. This home offers a real opportunity to renovate or subdivide (STCA).

Description:
WHAT AN OPPORTUNITY!
Set on a generous corner allotment of some 591m2 approx., this well cared for and updated brick veneer home provides a number of opportunities for the savvy buyer.
Whether it be your first home, an addition to your investment portfolio or a development prospect (STCA) given its ideal corner positioning, this property simply ticks all the boxes.
This solid home comprises:
• 3 generous sized bedrooms, (2 with BIR and one with fixed robes)
• Tastefully updated kitchen
• Updated carpet throughout
• Enormous back yard
• 1.5 car garage in addition to single carport
• Solar Power System

Description:
Fine Family Living
In a quiet court location, this spacious family home will tick all the boxes! The brick veneer property will be an amazing opportunity for any potential purchaser, for first home buyers, families, and investors alike, with a potential rental return of approximately $295p/w. Conveniently located within close vicinity to Corio Central Shopping Centre, with schools and public transport just around the corner. Extremely easy access to the highway, bringing Melbourne under an hour away & Geelongs CBD only 15 minutes.
- 3 great bedrooms with ceiling fans, 2 with built in robes
- Spacious kitchen/dining boasting gas cooking & dishwasher
- Bright & cosy living area
- Family bathroom with shower, bath & toilets
- Second living with window air conditioner
- Freshly painted throughout the home
- Large covered alfresco for entertainers
- Spacious backyard has low maintenance gardens
- Ducted heating throughout
- Double car garage
- Tinted windows
- Corner block on approx. 706sqm
Call now to book your inspection!

Description:
The Model Investment
Ideally located in the heart of Corio with quick access to the Melbourne Road and Corio Shopping Village sits this low maintenance brick home currently leased for $320 per week. Perfectly suited to an investor or first homebuyer. Featuring three generous sized bedrooms with BIR's serviced by the central bathroom. Central updated kitchen with meals area adjacent. This flows into the spacious light filled family living area. Step outside to embrace the large entertaining pergola and spacious low maintenance backyard. Includes SLUG, garden shed, ducted heating, split system A/C and secure off street parking. The perfect stepping-stone into the or addition to your investment portfolio.

Description:
Entertainers Delight
Are you looking for a convenient location that is close to schools, shops and the Ring Road and offers ample storage and an abundance of space to entertain family and friends? Well look no further; this is the perfect home for you.
Comprising of three generous size bedrooms, all with built in robes, master bedroom with split system heating/cooling and ceiling fan, centrally located and functional bathroom, separate laundry, and toilet & additional linen storage space.
The modern chic kitchen displays a one of a kind artistic splash back, which is sure to be a standout and is complete with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & gas cook top. Other features of the home include ducted heating and split system cooling.
Outside, the expansive undercover entertaining area is a master stroke of the residence and will be sure to please the seasoned entertainer. Also offering a timber decked area, well maintained gardens and storage shed, this spacious backyard is a pure oasis.
Living or investing in this location makes a lot of sense, so don’t miss your chance to make this rare and spacious property yours. Inspect today.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!

Description:
Charming Cloverdale Comfort
Offering all the elements for a vibrant family lifestyle with a fabulous floorplan and situated in the sought-after Cloverdale Estate, this property is sure to appeal to a variety of buyers.
Immaculately presented, this home features a modest timber kitchen that is full of character, complete with modern appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar and large adjoining dining area, making this the main family hub of the home.
Offering generous sized formal lounge area leading through to a second living zone, which showcases a coonara wood heater and gorgeous French doors that open out to the undercover entertaining deck; perfect for hosting family and friends all year round.
The property also comprises four bedrooms, three with built-in robes, master bedroom with ensuite, central main bathroom with shower and bath, separate toilet and large laundry.
Outdoor provides an expansive backyard that is perfect for the little ones to wear themselves out; even including a timber cubby house and has all your storage needs covered with a large double lock up shed.
Set in a convenient location; close to schools, easy access to the Ring Road for the keen commuter, public transport and the bustling Corio shopping precinct, this family home should be at the top of your inspection list.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.
